Remarks: Relax.... Kick of your shoes, take a deep breath and relish in the most incredible and desired Lake Michigan and Navy Pier view you can imagine.  Lake Point Tower is not only famous for some of its well-known residents, but also for its unbeatable LUXURY.  Indoor and Outdoor pools, beautifully landscaped park/garden, and a new 1M dollar spa/health club with racquetball court and a yoga studio will keep you looking good and make you feel like you live in a fancy resort.  No expense was spared in this unit's complete "down to the stacks" rehab in which the owner has impeccably maintained. Granite in kitchen and bathrooms, hardwood throughout, new appliances included. The newer a/c PTAC units, top of the line HEPA filter, room darkening blinds, and east exposure keep your energy costs low and your air quality fresh and healthy.
